div.p: Hello and welcome veteran.
My name is Judy Schwartz, and I'm the Veteran's Affairs certifying official
for DeSales University.
We proudly welcome all military personal whether you have served or are currently serving.
We have on-campus courses and also online courses.
We do know that the demands of your personal life, families,
careers and your military services and are here
to provide the most flexibility while earning your degree.
We have more than doubled our enrolment of veteran students and hope to continue to grow.
One of the newest and exciting GI Bills is the post 9/11 bill, also known as Chapter 33.
It's a wonderful benefit for all veterans as well as all of the other GI benefits.
I have a true interest in our military,
my son Andrew is in the National Guard, the 56th Striker Brigade.
And he was deployed last year to Iraq.
I think that because of this I can be of service
to our military students and be sensitive to their needs.
It is with great honor I can help them with their VA benefits.
You can learn more about your education benefits and application process
by visiting our website, www.desales.edu/military.
I work in the Registrars' Office which is located in Dooling Hall and would be more
than happy to answer any questions and help with the process of your military benefits.
Once again, welcome Veterans.
